thread.title: Politics › Japan eyes introducing multiple rates for 2017 consumption tax hike
thread.title_full: Politics › Japan eyes introducing multiple rates for 2017 consumption tax hike

title: Politics › Japan eyes introducing multiple rates for 2017 consumption tax hike
text: Politics › Japan eyes introducing multiple rates for 2017 consumption tax hike Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (29 minutes ago) The government is considering introducing multiple tax rates to ease tax burdens when it raises the consumption tax rate by 2 percentage points to 10% as planned in April 2017, Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshihide Suga said Tuesday. Citing reference to multiple rates to support lower income earners and smaller companies…
